headline: Occidental to Announce Fourth Quarter Results Tuesday, February 18, 2025; Hold Conference Call Wednesday, February 19, 2025
summary: HOUSTON, Jan. 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Occidental (NYSE: OXY) will announce its fourth quarter 2024 financial results after close of market on Tuesday, February 18, 2025, and will hold a conference call to discuss the results on Wednesday, February 19, 2025, at 1 p.m. Eastern/12 p.m. Central. The conference call may be accessed by calling 1-866-871-6512 (international callers dial 1-412-317-5417) or via webcast at oxy.com/investors. Participants may pre-register for the conference call at ht

headline: 2 Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy Hand Over Fist in January
summary: Over decades of building Berkshire Hathaway into the massive conglomerate it is today, Warren Buffett has become the most renowned investor in the world.  Between 1965 and 2023, Berkshire's stock generated a whopping 4,384,748% return, equating to a 19.8% compound annual growth rate (CAGR).  Given these impressive returns, investors should keep an eye on Berkshire's portfolio for new ideas although make sure to do your due diligence.
